headline: JPMorgan's investment banking chair departs, memo says
summary: Accenture nominated Nason as one of its candidates to be elected to the board, the Dublin-based consultancy firm said earlier on Monday.  Nason, an industry veteran, led the Technology, Media and Telecommunications global client practice and, according to Accenture, was responsible for JPMorgan's several key investment banking relationships around the world.

headline: JPMorgan Chase & Co. (JPM) Is Considered a Good Investment by Brokers: Is That True?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for JPMorgan Chase & Co. (JPM) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

headline: JPMorgan Fined ~$1.8M In Singapore Over Misconduct By Its Relationship Managers: Details
summary: JPMorgan Chase & Co (NYSE:JPM) has been fined S$2.4 million ($1.8 million) by the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) for failing to prevent and detect misconduct by its relationship managers (RMs). In 24 over-the-counter (OTC) bond transactions between November 2018 and September 2019, the RMs provided clients with inaccurate or incomplete disclosures, resulting in spreads exceeding agreed rates. Investigations found that JPM's practice was to charge clients a spread over the interbank prices

Investigations found that JPM's practice was to charge clients a spread over the interbank prices

headline: JPMorgan drops suit against Tesla
summary: The bank sued the Elon Musk-run company in 2021 for $162.2 million after it claimed the carmaker breached a 2014 contract related to stock warrants.

headline: Singapore cenbank fines JPMorgan $1.8 million over misconduct by relationship managers
summary: The Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) said JPMorgan's relationship managers provided inaccurate or incomplete information to clients in 24 instances of over-the-counter bond transactions, charging them spreads above the agreed rates.  MAS said in a statement that JPMorgan Chase did not have adequate processes and controls to ensure that relationship managers adhered to pre-agreed spreads with clients.

raw.headline: Singapore cenbank fines JPMorgan $1.8 million over misconduct by relationship managers

MAS said in a statement that JPMorgan Chase did not have adequate processes and controls to ensure that relationship managers adhered to pre-agreed spreads with clients.
